page.title: 15RECREATION:SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: One game that is played in the playgroun nd is called ball. There are two teams. One team starts off with the ball which has to be passed between that team. The next team has to try and catch the ball. Sometimes a group of passing boys might catch the ball. If this happens then the two teams in our game join together, until the ball has been caught. We start the game again. Another game which is played out of school is hedgehopping. Somebody dares you to run down the road hopping over all the hedges. If they are too tall you try and burst through them. This bit is okay it's just when you have to run back up the same road, hop through the same hedges and burst through the same hedges. This time the people are ready for you.
